tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    mechanic_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceExpenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  expense_date DATE,
  expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expense_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES VehicleMaintenanceRecords(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    mileage INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicle(id),
    mechanic_id INT REFERENCES mechanic(id),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE mechanic_assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    mechanic_id INT,
    assignment_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mechanic_id) REFERENCES mechanics(mechanic_id)
);
